vars.value: "A headset and thermal vision goggles system for the tracker specialization. Allows thermal imaging of living creatures. Click it to toggle."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A set of implantable lenses designed to augment your vision"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Used for seeing walls, floors, and stuff through anything."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "You can totally see in the dark now!"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A headset and goggles system for the M56 Smartgun. Has a low-res short range imager, allowing for view of terrain."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A headset and night vision goggles system for the M42 Scout Rifle. Allows highlighted imaging of surroundings. Click it to toggle."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A headset and night vision goggles system used by UPP forces. Allows highlighted imaging of surroundings. Click it to toggle."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A headset and night vision goggles system for the M4RA Battle Rifle. Allows highlighted imaging of surroundings. Click it to toggle."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Used to shield the user's eyes from harmful electromagnetic emissions, also used as general safety goggles. Not adequate as welding protection."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Used for shield the user's eyes from harmful electromagnetic emissions, can also be used as safety googles. Contains prescription lenses."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A heads-up display that provides important info in (almost) real time."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A heads-up display that scans human pain and perceived health."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A heads-up display that scans any nearby xenomorph's data."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A heads-up display that scans the humans in view and provides accurate data about their ID status and security records."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Polarized bioneural eyewear, designed to augment your vision."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A heads-up display that scans the humans in view and provides accurate data about their health status."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Strangely ancient technology used to help provide rudimentary eye cover. Enhanced shielding blocks many flashes."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of aviator sunglasses. Comes with yellow lens."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Flash-resistant goggles with inbuilt combat and security information."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A standard eyepiece, but modified to display security information to the user visually. This makes it commonplace among military police, though other models exist."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of designer sunglasses. Doesn't seem like it'll block flashes."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of larger than average designer sunglasses. Doesn't seem like it'll block flashes."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Strangely ancient technology used to help provide rudimentary eye cover. Larger than average enhanced shielding blocks many flashes."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Protects the eyes from welders, approved by the mad scientist association."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Welding goggles made from more expensive materials, strangely smells like potatoes."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A headset and goggles system for the M42 Scout Rifle. Allows highlighted imaging of surroundings. Click it to toggle."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Standard issue TGMC goggles. Mostly used to decorate one's helmet."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Standard issue TGMC goggles. Mostly used to decorate one's helmet. Contains prescription lenses in case you weren't sure if they were lame or not."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Forest green glasses, like the kind you'd wear when hatching a nasty scheme."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A long time ago, people used these glasses to makes images from screens threedimensional."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The goggles do nothing! Can be used as safety googles."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The Corps may call them Regulation Prescription Glasses but you know them as Rut Prevention Glasses."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Made by Nerd. Co's infiltration and surveillance department. Upon closer inspection, there's a small screen in each lens."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Something to cover up that artificial hand... Who says heroes can't be self-conscious?"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The cold, unfeeling hands of the law."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Because you really needed another excuse to punch your crewmates."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "These leather gloves protect against thorns, barbs, prickles, spikes and other harmful objects of floral origin."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves used by workers in dangerous environments."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "These tactical gloves are somewhat fire and impact resistant."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "These tactical gloves are somewhat fire and impact-resistant."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Regal blue gloves, with a nice gold trim. Swanky."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Standard issue marine tactical gloves. It reads: 'knit by Marine Widows Association'."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Gloves worn by commissars of the Imperial Army so that they do not soil their hands with the blood of their men."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Gloves with origins dating back to the old mining colonies."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Gloves with origins dating back to the old mining colonies. Seem to have more care and wear on them."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Armored gloves used in special operations. They are also insulated against electrical shock."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of heavily armored, insulated, acid-resistant gloves."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Sterile AND insulated! Why is not everyone issued with these?"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "You may like these gloves, but THEY think you are unworthy of them."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Blood crusts are attached to its metal studs, which are slightly dented."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A pair of gloves, they don't look special in any way."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "These gloves are cheap copies of the coveted gloves, no way this can end badly."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "These gloves will protect the wearer from electric shock."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A rod with some wire wrapped around the top. It'd be easy to attach something to the top bit."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A basic metal blade concealed in a lightweight plasteel grip. Small enough when folded to fit in a pocket."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A classic switchblade with gold engraving. Just holding it makes you feel like a gangster."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A large wooden baseball bat. Commonly used in colony recreation, but also used as a means of self defense. Often carried by thugs and ruffians."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A large metal baseball bat. Compared to its wooden cousin, the metal bat offers a bit more more force. Often carried by thugs and ruffians."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A rod of pure obsidian, its very presence disrupts and dampens the powers of paranormal phenomenae."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A huge, powerful blade on a metallic pole. Mysterious writing is carved into the weapon."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A huge, powerful blade on a metallic pole. Mysterious writing is carved into the weapon. This one is ancient and has suffered serious acid damage, making it near-useless."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A haphazardly-constructed yet still deadly weapon of ancient design."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Truly, the weapon of a madman. Who would think to fight fire with an axe?"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A compact yet rebalanced personal defense weapon. Can be concealed when folded."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A wooden truncheon for beating criminal scum."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A specialised prod designed for incapacitating xenomorphic lifeforms with."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A specialised prod designed for incapacitating xenomorphic lifeforms with. This one seems to be much more effective than its predecessor."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A stun baton for incapacitating people with."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A shield capable of stopping most projectile and melee attacks. It can be retracted, expanded, and stored anywhere."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A shield adept at blocking blunt objects from connecting with the torso of the shield wielder."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A bottle with a sharp broken bottom."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A tool used by great men to placate the frothing masses."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "May the force be within you. Sorta."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A length of leather-bound wood studded with razor-sharp teeth. How crude."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A military knife designed to be thrown at the enemy. Much quieter than a firearm, but requires a steady hand to be used effectively."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The standard issue survival knife issued to TerraGov Marine Corps soldiers. You can slide this knife into your boots, and can be field-modified to attach to the end of a rifle."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The standard issue survival knife of the UPP forces, the Type 30 is effective, but humble. It is small enough to be non-cumbersome, but lethal none-the-less."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A finely made Japanese sword, with a well sharpened blade. The blade has been filed to a molecular edge, and is extremely deadly. Commonly found in the hands of mercenaries and yakuza."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A cheap knock-off commonly found in regular knife stores. Can still do some damage."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "What are you standing around staring at this for? Get to killing!"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A dusty sword commonly seen in historical museums. Where you got this is a mystery, for sure. Only a mercenary would be nuts enough to carry one of these. Sharpened to deal massive damage."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The pride of an imperial commissar, held high as they charge into battle."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Latest issue of the TGMC Machete. Great for clearing out jungle or brush on outlying colonies. Found commonly in the hands of scouts and trackers, but difficult to carry with the usual kit."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A fancy ceremonial sword passed down from generation to generation. Despite this, it has been very well cared for, and is in top condition."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Its a gun. It's pretty terrible, though."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The actual firearm in the 4-piece M56B Smartgun System. Essentially a heavy, mobile machinegun.\nReloading is a cumbersome process requiring a powerpack. Click the powerpack icon in the top left or use special action to reload."

vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The actual firearm in the 4-piece M56D Smartgun System. If you have this, you're about to bring some serious pain to anyone in your way."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An archaic design, but one that's stood the test of time. Fires fast armor piercing rounds."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A cheap, reliable design and manufacture make this ubiquitous submachinegun useful despite the age. Put the fire mode to full auto for maximum firepower."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A replica of a 20th century USSR model submachinegun that many terrorist organizations had copied all over the years. Despite its small-hitting firepower, its reliablity, extreme longevity and high firepower rate proves useful for the hands of the user."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A robust, 20th century firearm that's a combination of pistol and submachinegun. Fires .32ACP caliber rounds from a 20 round magazine."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An archaic design going back hundreds of years, the MP27 was common in its day. Today it sees limited use as cheap computer-printed replicas or family heirlooms, though it somehow got into the hands of colonial rebels."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A German design, this was one of the most widely used submachine guns in the world. It's still possible to find this firearm in the hands of collectors or gun fanatics."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Armat Battlefield Systems M39 submachinegun. A light firearm capable of effective one-handed use that is ideal for close to medium range engagements. Uses 10x20mm rounds in a high capacity magazine."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Armat Battlefield Systems M39 submachinegun, B2 variant. This reliable weapon fires armor piercing 10x20mm rounds and is used by elite troops."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The T-19 submachine gun is the TerraGov Marine Corps standard issue SMG. Its known for it's compact size and ease of use inside the field. It's usually carried by specialized troops who do not have the space to carry a much larger gun like medics and engineers. It uses 10x20mm caseless rounds."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An automatic revolver chambered in .357 magnum. Commonly issued to Colonial Marshals. It has a burst mode. Currently in trial with other revolvers across Terra and other colonies."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The Mateba is a powerful, fast-firing revolver that uses its own recoil to rotate the cylinders. It uses heavy .454 rounds."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The Mateba is a powerful, fast-firing revolver that uses its own recoil to rotate the cylinders. It uses heavy .454 rounds. This version is a limited edition produced for the TGMC, and issued in extremely small amounts."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The Mateba is a powerful, fast-firing revolver that uses its own recoil to rotate the cylinders. This version is snubnosed, engraved with gold, tinted black, and highly customized for a high-ranking admiral. It uses heavy .454 rounds."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A lean .357 made by Smith & Wesson. A timeless classic, from antiquity to the future."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The Nagant-Yamasaki 7.62 is an effective killing machine designed by a consortion of shady Not-Americans. It is frequently found in the hands of criminals or mercenaries."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A bulky revolver, occasionally carried by assault troops and officers in the Marine Corps, as well civilian law enforcement. Uses .44 Magnum rounds."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The TP-44, Produced by Terran Armories. A sturdy and hard hitting firearm that loads .44 Magnum rounds. Holds 7 rounds in the cylinder. Due to the nature of the weapon, it’s rate of fire doesn’t quite match the output of other guns, but does hit much harder."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The back issue survival knife issued to TerraGov Marine Corps soldiers. There are a surprisingly large amount of attachment points on this... knife."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A powerful sidearm issued mainly to highly trained elite assassin necro-cyber-agents."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An advanced, select-fire machine pistol capable of three round burst. Last seen cleaning up the mean streets of Detroit."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A massive, formidable automatic handgun chambered in 9mm squash-head rounds. Commonly seen in the hands of wealthy Nanotrasen members."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A powerful sidearm issued mainly to Nanotrasen private contractors, but issued to the TGMC in small numbers, based on the original VP70 more than a century ago. Fires 9mm armor piercing rounds and is capable of 3-round burst."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A Colonial Marshals issued, powerful semi-automatic pistol chambered in armor piercing 9mm caliber rounds. Used for centuries by law enforcement and criminals alike, recently recreated with this new model."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A tiny pistol meant for hiding in hard-to-reach areas. Best not ask where it came from."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The KT-42 Automag is an archaic but reliable design, going back many decades. There have been many versions and variations, but the 42 model is by far the most common. You can't go wrong with this handcannon."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An updated variant of an old eastern design, dating back to from the 20th century. Features an integrated silencer, and chambered in the razor small .22 rounds. This one is loaded with the more common .22 hollowpoint rounds and appears to be a mercenary version."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An updated variant of an old eastern design, dating back to from the 20th century. Features an integrated silencer, and chambered in the razor small .22 rounds. This one is loaded with the more common .22 hollowpoint rounds and appears to be a UPP model."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An updated variant of an old eastern design, dating back to from the 20th century. Features an integrated silencer, and chambered in the razor small .22 rounds. This one is usually loaded with special low-recoil .22 dart rounds, which act as a dangerous tranquilizer."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: {"A magnum chambered in .50AE that comes with a serious kick. This one is engraved, \"Peace through superior firepower\"."}

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A popular police firearm in the 20th century, often employed by hardboiled cops while confronting terrorists. A classic of its time, chambered in 9x19mm."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A 20th century military firearm customized for special forces use, fires tranq darts to take down enemies nonlethally."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A variant of a classic pistol, modified to allow for bursts. It is fitted with a vertical foregrip at the front end of the trigger guard to provide better stability when firing."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A standard M1911 chambered in .45 ACP. Has a smaller magazine capacity, but packs a better punch."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A 20th century military firearm that received several modifications. It seems to have been lovingly taken care of and passed down the family. Lacks an auto magazine eject feature."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An M4A3 Colt Service Pistol, the standard issue sidearm of the TerraGov Marine Corps."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An M4A3 Service Pistol, the standard issue sidearm of the TerraGov Marine Corps. This one has an ivory-colored grip and has a slide carefully polished yearly by a team of orphan children. Looks like it belongs to a low-ranking officer."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The TP-14, produced by Terran Armories. A reliable sidearm that loads 9x19mm Parabellum Auto munitions. Capable of mounting a limited amount of attachments, and firing at a respectable rate of fire, often as fast as you can pull the trigger. Takes 14 round magazines."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A spring loaded rifle designed to fit syringes, designed to incapacitate unruly patients from a distance."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A modification of the syringe gun design, using a rotating cylinder to store up to four syringes."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A gun that fires flares. Replace with flares. Simple!"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "M240A1 incinerator unit has proven to be one of the most effective weapons at clearing out soft-targets. This is a weapon to be feared and respected as it is quite deadly."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An improved version of the M240A1 incinerator unit, the M240-T model is capable of dispersing a larger variety of fuel types. Contains an underbarrel fire extinguisher!"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A double barreled shotgun of archaic, but sturdy design. Uses 12 gauge shells, but can only hold 2 at a time."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A double barreled shotgun whose barrel has been artificially shortened to reduce range but increase damage and spread."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The Nanotrasen MK221 Shotgun, a quick-firing semi-automatic shotgun."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A cobbled-together pile of scrap and alien wood. Point end towards things you want to die. Has a burst fire feature, as if it needed it."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The MIC ZX-76 Assault Shotgun, a double barreled semi-automatic combat shotgun with a twin shot mode, has a 9 round internal magazine. Currently retired by the main TGMC forces for the addition of the SX-16 and later the MBX-900, it is now only used in special operations and smaller divisions across Terra."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An Armat Battlefield Systems classic design, the M37A2 combines close-range firepower with long term reliability. Requires a pump, which is a Unique Action."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The T-35 is the shotgun used by the TerraGov Marine Corps. It's used as a close quarters tool when someone wants something more suited for close range than most people, or as an odd sidearm on your back for emergencies. Uses 12 gauge shells."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A peculiarly designed pump shotgun, featuring a massive magazine well, a compact bullpup design and military attachment compatablity. This pump shotgun is issued for counter-terrorist units and unlicensed private military contractors."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A nine-round pump action shotgun. A sporterized version of a classic shotgun used for hunting, home defence and police work, modified and used by Colonial Marshals"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A .44 magnum lever action rifle with side loading port. It has a low fire rate, but it packs quite a punch in hunting."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A .410 bore lever action shotgun that fires as fast as you can operate the lever. A recently-adopted shotgun in the wake of the SX-16 automatic shotgun replacing the MIC ZX-76 assault shotgun for use in standard-issue TGMC specialist inventory."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: {"A mosin nagant rifle, even just looking at it you can feel the cosmoline already. Commonly known by its slang, \"Moist Nugget\", by downbrained colonists and outlaws."}

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A laser based firearm. Uses power cells."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A heavy-duty, multifaceted energy weapon that uses pulse-based beam generation technology to emit powerful laser blasts. Because of its complexity and cost, it is rarely seen in use except by specialists and front-line combat personnel. This is a testing model issued only for Asset Protection."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An accurate, recoilless laser based battle rifle with an integrated charge selector. Ideal for longer range engagements. Uses power cells instead of ballistic magazines.."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An accurate, recoilless laser based battle rifle. Only accepts practice power cells and it doesn't have a charge selector. Uses power cells instead of ballistic magazines."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An advanced stun device capable of firing balls of ionized electricity. Used for nonlethal takedowns."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The M4RA battle rifle is a designated marksman rifle in service with the TGMC. Only fielded in small numbers, and sporting a bullpup configuration, the M4RA battle rifle is perfect for reconnaissance and fire support teams.\nIt is equipped with rail scope and takes 10x24mm A19 high velocity magazines."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The TX-15 Automatic Assault Shotgun, produced by Terran Armories. Another iteration of the ZX series of firearms, taking over the SX as the semi-automatic shotgun provided to the TGMC. Compared to the SX, this Shotgun is rifled, and loads primarily longer ranged munitions, being incompatible with buckshot shells. Takes 12 round magazines."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An automatic shotgun with an impressive rate of fire. It uses 16 gauge magazines of either buckshot, slug or flechette. The SX-16 only recently left field testing, and is one of the more recent additions to the TGMC's arsenal, replacing the ZX-76 because of reliability issues."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The primary service rifle of the UPP forces, the Type 71 is a reliable rifle chambered in 7.62x39mm, firing in two round bursts to conserve ammunition. A newer model for surpression roles to comply with overmatch doctrines is in progress and only issued to a limited number of divisions in the UPP army."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A carbine variant of the Type 71 pulse rifle for quicker aiming. A surpression model in addition to the main rifle is in progress."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An much rarer variant of the standard Type 71, this version contains an integrated supressor, a scope, and lots of fine-tuning. Many parts have been replaced, filed down, and improved upon. As a result, this variant is rarely seen issued outside of commando units and officer cadres."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: " This appears to be a less common variant of the usual Type 71, with an undermounted flamethrower and improved iron sights."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A large weapon capable of laying down supressing fire, based on the M41A pulse rifle platform. Went under field testing, however it failed to surpass its trials and was replaced by the T-42 light machine gun."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The T-42 LMG is the TGMC's current standard non-IFF-capable LMG. It's known for its ability to lay down heavy fire support very well. It is generally used when someone wants to hold a position or provide fire support. It uses 10x24mm ammunition."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A light, versatile assault rifle with a 30 round magazine, chambered to fire the 5.56x45mm NATO cartridge. The 4th generation in the M16 platform, this FN variant substitutes automatic for burst fire and retains relevance among mercenaries and militias thanks to its high customizability."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A crude, cheaply produced assault rifle capable of automatic fire. A replicant of the 1947 Kalashnikov rifle made with wood coloured plating, chambering the orginal 7.62x39mm round. Despite lacking attachment points, remains a popular product on the black market with its cheap cost and armor punching rounds."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A crude, cheaply produced battle carbine copy capable of automatic fire, a shortened version of the Kalashnikov rifle. Commonly found in the hands of criminals or mercenaries."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","automatic fire mode","burst-fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An older design of the pulse rifle used by the TerraGov Marine Corps. Uses 10x24mm caseless ammunition."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "An outdated rifle for the TerraGov Marine Corps, carried by a few coporate mercenaries,the M41A1 is a very rare sight in TerraGov systems. Uses 10x24mm caseless ammunition."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A refined and redesigned version of the tried and tested M41A1 Pulse Rifle. Given only to elite units."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The T-64 DMR is the TerraGov Marine Corps designated marksman rifle. It is rather well-known for it's very consistent target placement at longer than usual range, it however lacks a burst fire mode or an automatic mode. It is mostly used by people who prefer to do more careful shooting than most. Uses 10x27 caliber."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The T-12 assault rifle used to be the TerraGov Marine Corps standard issue rifle before the T-18 carbine replaced it. It's however still used widely despite that. The gun itself is very good at being used in most situations however it suffers in engagements at close quarters and is relatively hard to shoulder than some others. It uses 10x24mm caseless ammunition."

vars.name: gun_firemode_list
vars.value: list("semi-auto fire mode","burst-fire mode","auto-burst-fire mode","automatic fire mode")

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The T-18 carbine is one of the standard rifles used by the TerraGov Marine Corps. It's commonly used by people who prefer greater mobility in combat, like scouts and other light infantry. Lacks an automatic fire mode, but has a burst fire mode to improve damage output. Uses 10x24mm caseless ammunition."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A sniper variant of the AK-47 service rifle, with a new stock, barrel, and scope. It doesn't have the punch of modern sniper rifles, but it's finely crafted in 2133 by someone probably illiterate. Fires 7.62x54mmR rounds."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: {"A heavy sniper rifle manufactured by Armat Systems. It has a scope system and fires armor penetrating rounds out of a 15-round magazine.\nIt has an integrated Target Marker and a Laser Targeting system.\n\"Peace Through Superior Firepower\"."}

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A high end mag-rail heavy sniper rifle from Nanotrasen chambered in the heaviest ammo available, 10x99mm Caseless."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A heavy, 6-shot grenade launcher used by the TerraGov Marine Corps for area denial and big explosions."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The M5 RPG is the primary anti-armor weapon of the TGMC. Used to take out light-tanks and enemy structures, the M5 RPG is a dangerous weapon with a variety of combat uses."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The M57-A4 'Lightning Bolt' is posssibly the most destructive man-portable weapon ever made. It is a 4-barreled missile launcher capable of burst-firing 4 thermobaric missiles. Enough said."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "It's a damn minigun! The ultimate in man-portable firepower, spraying countless high velocity armor piercing rounds with a rotary action, this thing will no doubt pack a punch."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The Mark 74 Railgun is top of the line for space based weaponry. Capable of firing a round with a diameter of 3/4ths of a meter at 24 kilometers per second. It also is capable of using a variety of round types which can be interchanged at anytime with its newly designed feed system."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "A ship memorial dedicated to the triumphs of the TGMC and the fallen marines of this ship. On the left there are grand tales of victory etched into the slab. On the right there is a list of famous marines who have fallen in combat serving the TGMC."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Cold launch tubes that can fire a few varieties of missiles out of them The most common being the ASAT-21 Rapier IV missile used against satellites and other spacecraft and the BGM-227 Sledgehammer missile which is used for ground attack."

vars.value: "The IBM series 10 computer retrofitted to work as a sensor computer for the ship. While somewhat dated it still serves its purpose."

vars.value: "A dismounted GAU-21 'Rattler' 30mm rotary cannon. It seems to be missing its feed links and has exposed connection wires. Capable of firing 5200 rounds a minute, feared by many for its power. Earned the nickname 'Rattler' from the vibrations it would cause on dropships in its inital production run."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The XN-99 'Napalm' is an incendiary rocket used to turn specific targeted areas into giant balls of fire for a long time."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The SM-17 'Fatty' is a cluster-bomb type ordnance that only requires laser-guidance when first launched."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The GBU-67 'Keeper II' is the latest in a generation of laser guided weaponry that spans all the way back to the 20th century. Earning its nickname from a shortening of 'Peacekeeper' which comes from the program that developed its guidance system and the various uses of it during peacekeeping conflicts. Its payload is designed to devastate armored targets."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The AGM-227 missile is a mainstay of the overhauled dropship fleet against any mobile or armored ground targets. It's earned the nickname of 'Banshee' from the sudden wail that it emitts right before hitting a target. Useful to clear out large areas."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The AIM-224 is the latest in air to air missile technology. Earning the nickname of 'Widowmaker' from various dropship pilots after improvements to its guidence warhead prevents it from being jammed leading to its high kill rate. Not well suited for ground bombardment, but its high velocity makes it reach its target quickly."

vars.name: name
vars.value: "The Most Robust Men Award for Robustness"

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "To be Robust is not an action or a way of life, but a mental state. Only those with the force of Will strong enough to act during a crisis, saving friend from foe, are truly Robust. Stay Robust my friends."

vars.value: "A mattress seated on a rectangular metallic frame. This is used to support a lying person in a comfortable manner, notably for regular sleep. Ancient technology, but still useful."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The common tongue of the various Vox ships making up the Shoal. It sounds like chaotic shrieking to everyone else."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The common language of Moghes, composed of sibilant hisses and rattles. Spoken natively by Unathi."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "Maintained by the various trading cartels in major systems, this elegant, structured language is used for bartering and bargaining."

vars.name: desc
vars.value: "The traditionally employed tongue of Ahdomai, composed of expressive yowls and chirps. Native to the Tajaran."
